item.title: My Second Post
item.description: This is my second post with HUGO Preliminary # Import combinations with replacements from itertools from itertools import combinations_with_replacement Create a list of objects # Create a list of objects to combine list_of_objects = ['warplanes', 'armor', 'infantry'] Find all combinations (with replacement) for the list # Create an empty list object to hold the results of the loop combinations = [] # Create a loop for every item in the length of list_of_objects, that, for i in list(range(len(list_of_objects))): # Finds every combination (with replacement) for each object in the list combinations.
